She has extensive experience working in start-up teams aswell as establishing her own successful recruitment firm. She has developed and delivered recruitment strategies, processes and solutions for permanent and contingent labour for clients, and recruited across a range of industry sectors such as banking and finance, telco, education, manufacturing, mining and resources, pharmaceutical, management consulting, FMCG, and the public sector. Jenny has recruited roles for graduates through to senior executive level candidates within accounting and finance, office support, sales, procurement and supply chain, and management consultants. 

Jenny has demonstrated exceptional stakeholder engagement and influencing skills during her career. She is a self-motivated, proactive individual with a professional approach to work and determined to achieve objectives and results. Known to be extremely organised, conscientious and reliable with high work ethics, her clients and customers would describe her working style as consultative, collaborative, honest and results focussed. 

Jenny is currently onsite through Hays Talent Solutions as the Senior Talent Acquisition Business Partner for a new MSP and RPO solution for a recognised global financial services brand.  She is responsible for delivering an exemplary service to the client, meeting contractual SLA’s, and identifying opportunities to improve and streamline recruitment processes.  

Jenny fosters a spirit of ongoing partnership by delivering a bespoke service aligned to her clients fundamental needs and requirements ensuring a highly engaged customer experience for internal stakeholders and talent alike.

I continuously educate, engage and influence senior level stakeholders regarding the HTS Talent Acquisition service and solution, which increases compliance, reduces risk and costs, ensures efficiency, processes and reporting capabilities are in place to find the best talent for the business in a timely fashion.  I build strong relationships with key stakeholders, manage third party recruitment suppliers and candidates throughout the recruitment process, provide employee on-boarding and off-boarding services, payroll management for contractors, systems and recruitment process training, and ensuring KPI’s, SLA’s and compliance standards are achieved.

jobs.jobTitle: Candidate Consultant; Surgery, General Medicine, Paediatrics and O&G
jobs.description:
I was a part of the very successful Medical Recruitment team at Charterhouse, the largest supplier of locum doctors throughout Australia.

My role as Candidate Manager involved both sourcing suitable locum doctors and taking ownership of all regulatory, credentialing and logistical requirements involved with placing doctors. I liaised on a daily basis with both clients and candidates in order to ensure this is a smooth process for all involved. My performance and stakeholder management skills drew praise for being able to engage productively with known difficult clients and to yield a high level volume of doctor placements.

I worked within the General Medicine division focusing on the placement of Paediatricians, Surgeons, Obstetricians and Gynecologists. As part of a team of three high performing consultants my ability to prioritise and develop relationships was key to the success of having the most successful desk in our sector. 

Duties included:
• Making short term placements for registered medical officers
• Assisting in headhunting exercises
• Credentialing: internal, regulatory body and client
• Creating candidate and client contracts
• Liaising with both candidates and clients on a daily basis
• Organising the logistics behind a placement (travel, accommodation and arrival instructions)
• General administration overview - CV formatting, reference checking and job ad posting
• Managing candidate availability and job preferences
• First point of contact for any on-site problems during locum placements 
• Pre-placement check-in / post-placement check in with both client and candidates
• Organising and attending all division conferences
